ingredients.item: 2 x 400g packs diced British beef braising steak
2 x 250g pouches Tilda Pure Steamed Basmati Rice

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 180°C, gas mark 4. Heat the oil in a casserole dish over a high heat, then brown the steak in 2 batches. Return all the meat to the pan and add the curry paste. Cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the tomatoes, stock and curry leaves, bring to the boil. Cover and cook in the oven for 1 hour. Add the aubergine, re-cover and
cook for a further 1½ hours until the meat is tender. Stir in the coriander.
Heat the rice according to the pack instructions and serve with the curry.
